name: claribox
description: A Gmail sidebar extension that shows only what matters in your inbox

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:extension && npm run install:shared
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:extension
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:extension && npm run test:shared
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:extension && npm run lint:shared
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:extension && npm run format:shared
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist && rm -rf backend/node_modules && rm -rf extension/dist && rm -rf extension/node_modules && rm -rf shared/dist && rm -rf shared/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run build:shared

author: Claribox Team
